rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimalistic Art Deco elements and functional storage, aligning with Vastu principles for entry orientation.

An open-plan living area integrated with a dining section, featuring geometric patterns typical of Art Deco design. The seating arrangement is optimized for social interactions and sunlight exposure from the East window side, per Vastu.
A compact kitchen space designed in an Art Deco style with chrome accents. Placed strategically to maintain energy flow as prescribed by Vastu.
Multipurpose studio area serving as a home office and art space, featuring Art Deco detailing and natural light from West-facing windows, aligning with the plot orientation.

openings.description: Entry door ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Large window facilitating natural lighting in living and dining areas.
A skylight to bring in additional light for the studio space.
Access door leading to a rooftop terrace, designed with Art Deco balustrading.

rooms.description: A master bedroom with Art Deco accent walls and comfortable furnishing, optimized for relaxation.
An integrated home theater with acoustic design tailored to the room's dimensions, featuring Art Deco aesthetic details.

openings.description: Window providing a calming view and optimal light for relaxation.
